executable.title: Otsu Threshold
executable.description: This filter creates a binary thresholded image that separates an image into foreground and background components. The filter computes the threshold using the algorthm described in "xxx", applies that theshold to the input image using the BinaryThresholdImageFilter. The NumberOfHistogram bins can be set for the Otsu Calculator. The insideValue and outsideValue can be set for the BinaryThresholdImageFilter.

integer.name: insideValue
integer.description: The value assigned to pixels that are inside the computed threshold
integer.label: Inside Value

integer.name: outsideValue
integer.description: The value assigned to pixels that are outside the computed threshold
integer.label: Outside Value

integer.name: numberOfBins
integer.description: The number of bins in the histogram
